description: Note T1- 3 all planted very close together within 50cm of north boundary wall. T1 Olea europaeus Existing height c.5m Spread  3m		-Crown overcrowded with much dead wood. *Thin out dying, crossing & overcrowded branches,  lift & reduce crown by 25% to 3.5m diameter spread & 2.5m hT2  Olea europaeusExisting height c.5m Spread  3m				-Crown overcrowded with much dead wood. *Thin out dying, crossing & overcrowded branches,  lift & reduce crown by 25% to 3.5m diameter spread & 2.5m hT3  Ilex aquifolium- multi-stem standardExisting height c.4m Spread  3m			Currently overcrowded by sucker from Ailanthus  in neighbouring garden.		 Thin out dying, crossing & overcrowded branches,  lift  & reduce crown by 25% to 3.5m diameter spread & 2.5m hT4  Gleditzia	 Planted very close to south boundary wall	Existing height c.8-9m Spread  6m			-Crown overcrowded with congested regrowth after hard prune some years previously *Thin out overcrowded branches,  lift  & reduce crown by 25% to 4.5m diameter spread & 6m hT5 Ailanthus sucker from established tree in neighbouring gardenExisting height c.4m Spread  3m			Base arising within 30cm of Ilex and overcrowding it.*Fell to remove as it is overwhelming the Ilex and there is insufficient room for it.No room for replacement tree as already 3 other trees here
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
